options.name: Strength of Arms
options.description: Gain +1 skill with might. Whenever you use an action or reaction to attack with a weapon with the slashing property, you can spend 1 energy to gain an additional dice on the roll.

options.name: Reaction : Counter Cut
options.description: In response to being targeted by a melee attack, you attempt to turn your defense into damage. In addition to your defense check, roll a single attack dice with a slashing weapon. Regardless of the result of your defense check, the attacker must make a resilience check against your single attack dice, or gain the bleeding condition.

options.name: Action : Hamstring
options.description: You make an attack using a melee weapon with the slashing property, aiming to hinder a creature's movement. If at least 2 of your attack dice hit and the attack deals damage, the target of this ability must make an endurance check of 6 at the start of each turn until they succeed. On a failure, the creature cannot take their free movement on their turn and their sprint speed is halved.

options.name: Heavy Blades
options.description: Your training with large and complex blades has resulted in changes to your physique. Gain +1 skill with endurance and +2 maximum health.

options.name: Executioner
options.description: You are both ruthless and efficient. Gain +2 psychic mitigation. When you kill a creature that is a champion tier or higher using a weapon with the slashing property, you can choose to decapitate them. Any minions or grunts within a short (10 unit) distance must make a resilience check of 7 or higher or become afraid of you.

options.name: Sense Weakness
options.description: You have a natural sense for those who are physically impaired. Gain +1 skill with senses. When you make an attack against a creature with at least two physical conditions, gain a bonus dice.

options.name: Master of Blades
options.description: Your skill with execution weapons is legendary. Gain +1 skill with complex melee weapons.

options.name: Action : Gusher
options.description: You make an attack with a weapon that has the slashing property and force the target to make a resilience check against the total physical damage dealt. On a failure, they gain the bleeding condition but it deals an extra 1 damage and the check to recover from the condition starts at 12 instead of 10.

options.name: Action : Guillotine
options.description: You make an attack against a prone creature using a weapon with the slashing property. If at least 3 dice hit, you deal an additional 10 physical damage.

options.name: The Final Cut
options.description: When you hit a minion or a grunt with a slashing weapon, you execute them if you deal at least 1 damage. A standard tier creature is executed if you have 3 critical hits in one attack roll.
